verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had finished <S%G5055><s%> commanding <S%G1299><s%> his <S%G846><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%>, he departed <S%G3327><s%> thence <S%G1564><s%> to teach <S%G1321><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> preach <S%G2784><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> cities <S%G4172><s%>.

Now when <S%G1161><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the prison <S%G1201><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of the Christ <S%G5547><s%>, he sent <S%G3992><s%> by <S%G1417><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%>
and said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, art <S%G1488><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> he that comes <S%G2064><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> look we for <S%G4328><s%> another <S%G2087><s%>?

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Go <S%G4198><s%> and tell <S%G518><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> the <S%G518><s%> things which <S%G3739><s%> you hear <S%G191><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> see <S%G991><s%>:

the blind <S%G5185><s%> receive their sight <S%G308><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the lame <S%G5560><s%> walk <S%G4043><s%>, the lepers <S%G3015><s%> are cleansed <S%G2511><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the deaf <S%G2974><s%> hear <S%G191><s%>, and the dead <S%G3498><s%> are raised up <S%G1453><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the poor <S%G4434><s%> have good tidings preached to them <S%G2097><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> blessed <S%G3107><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> he <S%G3739><s%>, whosoever <S%G1437><s%> shall <S%G4624><s%> find no <S%G3361><s%> occasion of stumbling <S%G4624><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me <S%G1698><s%>.

And as <S%G1161><s%> these <S%G5130><s%> went their way <S%G4198><s%>, Jesus <S%G2424><s%> began <S%G756><s%> to say <S%G3004><s%> unto the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> John <S%G2491><s%>, What <S%G5101><s%> went ye out <S%G1831><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the wilderness <S%G2048><s%> to behold <S%G2300><s%>? a reed <S%G2563><s%> shaken <S%G4531><s%> with <S%G5259><s%> the wind <S%G417><s%>?

But <S%G235><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> went ye out <S%G1831><s%> to see <S%G1492><s%>? a man <S%G444><s%> clothed <S%G294><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> soft <S%G3120><s%> clothes <S%G2440><s%>? Behold <S%G2400><s%>, they that <S%G3588><s%> wear <S%G5409><s%> soft <S%G3120><s%> clothes are <S%G1526><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> kings <S%G935><s%>' houses <S%G3624><s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> went ye out <S%G1831><s%>? to see <S%G1492><s%> a prophet <S%G4396><s%>? Yea <S%G3483><s%>, I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> much more than <S%G4053><s%> a prophet <S%G4396><s%>.

This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> he <S%G4012><s%>, of whom <S%G3739><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%>, Behold <S%G2400><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> send <S%G649><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> messenger <S%G32><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> face <S%G4383><s%>, Who <S%G3739><s%> shall prepare <S%G2680><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> way <S%G3598><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%>.

Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, Among <S%G1722><s%> them that are born <S%G1084><s%> of women <S%G1135><s%> there has <S%G1453><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> arisen <S%G1453><s%> a greater than <S%G3187><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> the Baptist <S%G910><s%>: yet <S%G1161><s%> he that is but little <S%G3398><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> greater than <S%G3187><s%> he <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> of John <S%G2491><s%> the Baptist <S%G910><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> now <S%G737><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> suffereth violence <S%G971><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> men of violence <S%G973><s%> take <S%G726><s%> it <S%G846><s%> by force <S%G726><s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> prophesied <S%G4395><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> John <S%G2491><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> you are willing <S%G2309><s%> to receive <S%G1209><s%> it <S%G846><s%>, this is <S%G2076><s%> Elijah <S%G2243><s%>, that <S%G3588><s%> is <S%G3195><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%>.
He that has <S%G2192><s%> ears <S%G3775><s%> to hear <S%G191><s%>, let him hear <S%G191><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> whereunto <S%G5101><s%> shall I compare <S%G3666><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%>? It is <S%G2076><s%> like unto <S%G3664><s%> sons <S%G3808><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the marketplaces <S%G58><s%>, who <S%G2532><s%> call unto <S%G4377><s%> their <S%G846><s%> fellows <S%G3664><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> say <S%G3004><s%>, We piped <S%G832><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> ye did not <S%G3756><s%> dance <S%G3738><s%>; we wailed <S%G2354><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> ye did <S%G2875><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> mourn <S%G2875><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> neither <S%G3383><s%> eating <S%G2068><s%> nor <S%G3383><s%> drinking <S%G4095><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they say <S%G3004><s%>, He hath <S%G2192><s%> a demon <S%G1140><s%>.

The Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> eating <S%G2068><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> drinking <S%G4095><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they say <S%G3004><s%>, Behold <S%G2400><s%>, a gluttonous <S%G5314><s%> man <S%G444><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a winebibber <S%G3630><s%>, a friend <S%G5384><s%> of tax collectors <S%G5057><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%>! And <S%G2532><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> is justified <S%G1344><s%> by <S%G575><s%> her <S%G846><s%> works <S%G5043><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> began he <S%G756><s%> to upbraid <S%G3679><s%> the cities <S%G4172><s%> where <S%G3739><s%> most <S%G4118><s%> of <S%G1411><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mighty works <S%G1411><s%> were done <S%G1096><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> they repented <S%G3340><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>.

Woe <S%G3759><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%>, Chorazin <S%G5523><s%>! woe <S%G3759><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%>, Bethsaida <S%G966><s%>! for <S%G3754><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> the mighty works <S%G1411><s%> had been done <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Tyre <S%G5184><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Sidon <S%G4605><s%> which were done <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, they <S%G3340><s%> would have <S%G302><s%> repented <S%G3340><s%> long ago <S%G3819><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> sackcloth <S%G4526><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ashes <S%G4700><s%>.

But <S%G4133><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, it shall be <S%G2071><s%> more tolerable <S%G414><s%> for Tyre <S%G5184><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Sidon <S%G4605><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> of judgment <S%G2920><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> for you <S%G5213><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> you <S%G4771><s%>, Capernaum <S%G2584><s%>, shall you be exalted <S%G5312><s%> unto <S%G2193><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>? you shall go down <S%G2601><s%> unto <S%G2193><s%> Hades <S%G86><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> the mighty works <S%G1411><s%> had been done <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Sodom <S%G4670><s%> which were done <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%>, it <S%G3306><s%> would have <S%G302><s%> remained <S%G3306><s%> until <S%G3360><s%> this day <S%G4594><s%>.

But <S%G4133><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> it shall be <S%G2071><s%> more tolerable <S%G414><s%> for the land <S%G1093><s%> of Sodom <S%G4670><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> of judgment <S%G2920><s%>, than <S%G2228><s%> for thee <S%G4671><s%>.

At <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> season <S%G2540><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%>, I thank <S%G1843><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%>, O Father <S%G3962><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> you did hide <S%G613><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the wise <S%G4680><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> understanding <S%G4908><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> did reveal <S%G601><s%> them <S%G846><s%> unto babes <S%G3516><s%>:
Yes <S%G3483><s%>, Father <S%G3962><s%>, for <S%G3754><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> it was <S%G1096><s%> well-pleasing <S%G2107><s%> in <S%G1715><s%> thy sight <S%G4675><s%>.

All things <S%G3956><s%> have been delivered <S%G3860><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> no one <S%G3762><s%> knows <S%G1921><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%>, save <S%G1487><s%> the <S%G3361><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%>; neither <S%G3761><s%> does any <S%G5100><s%> know <S%G1921><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%>, save <S%G1487><s%> the <S%G3361><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> he to whomever <S%G3739><s%> the <S%G1437><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> willeth <S%G1014><s%> to reveal him <S%G601><s%>.

Come <S%G1205><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>, all <S%G3956><s%> ye that labor <S%G2872><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> are heavy laden <S%G5412><s%>, and I <S%G2504><s%> will give <S%G373><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> rest <S%G373><s%>.

Take <S%G142><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> yoke <S%G2218><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> learn <S%G3129><s%> of <S%G575><s%> me <S%G1700><s%>; for <S%G3754><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> meek <S%G4235><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> lowly <S%G5011><s%> in heart <S%G2588><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> ye shall find <S%G2147><s%> rest <S%G372><s%> unto <S%G5590><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> souls <S%G5590><s%>.
